sub_title: Business Director - Digital & Social at United Media Services LLC
summary:
I am a communication professional with a decade of hands-on experience in Advertising, Social Media, Communication and Digital Design.

The fast-paced advertising environment has enabled me to work across industries and sectors which the Sultanate has to offer - I have worked with both, B2B and B2C nature of clients and engaged with them in a range of services such as Strategic Planning for a Social & Digital Roll Out, Integrated Communication Planning with a 360-degree perspective, People and Team Management, Influencer Management, Creative and Copy Direction, Understanding Market Research and Dynamics, Managing social media handles for the organizations as well as their Senior Stakeholders.

treasury_media.title: Coffee With Y: Malvika Asher
treasury_media.description: Meet digital artist Malvika Asher who is throwing light on the matter of women empowerment in Oman using nothing but her art. #Oman #Muscat #CoffeeWithY... | By Y Magazine | Facebook

treasury_media.title: IPL 2017: An artist arrives from Muscat (Malvika Asher) to net Hardik Pandya
WorldT20 through digital art by Malvika Asher - published by Khaleej Times
Colourful Abstracts in Creative Gaga, by Digital Artist Malvika Asher
treasury_media.description: Inspired by her immediate surroundings, Malvika Asher develops her concepts through meticulous observation. While rich dab of colours add a dreamy dimension to each composition, they do not go far away from reality. The artworks take liberties by altering colour and form in ways that are conspicuous. The surrounding objects, colours and patterns, all add to that purpose.

treasury_media.title: The Legacy of Savitribai Phule by Malvika Asher for  Google Institute of Arts & Culture, India
treasury_media.description: Savitribai Phule was a trailblazer in providing education for girls and for ostracized portions of society. Her life and work is a testament to social reform and female empowerment in Indian society, and is presented here by digital designer, Malvika Asher

school.name: Symbiosis Institute Of Media And Communication, Pune

publications.name: Savitribai Phule 103rd Birthday
publications.publisher: Google Institute of Arts and Culture, India

authors.headline: Business Director - Digital & Social at United Media Services LLC

profile_positions.description:
Brand development through social media, by identifying target customers, setting clear objectives, building an effective content strategy to engage the audience, increasing traffic and boosting conversions

B2B, as well as B2C experience in Brand Management

Work expertise in Government, Oil and Gas,Tourism, Manufacturing, Retail - Malls, F&B, Banking, Islamic Banking, Non-Bank Finance, Insurance and Retail - FMCG

Hiring and supervising talented in-house resources, as well as freelance teams located within the Sultanate, and across various geographies to achieve team targets

Current portfolio includes 16 brands - namely Shell Oman Marketing, Jindal Steel, OMRAN Group, Oman Flour Mills, Ahlibank, Bank Nizwa, Pizza Hut, Oman Avenues Mall, Lulu Group International and more

Overseeing a team of
6 SM Account Managers
2 Digital Media Account Managers
2 Copywriters
3 Designers
1 ORM Manager

Monitoring social media trends, including developments in design, applications, strategy and innovation to stay relevant

Managing a network of influencers, celebrities and third-party social media channels for regular interaction, support and amplifying required messages

Integrating with in-house communication and public relations teams to propose a winning bid
profile_positions.title: Business Director - Digital Services & Social Media

profile_positions.description:
Design and implement social media strategy to align with client and business goals

Setting specific objectives and reporting on ROI for clients

Generating, editing and publishing engaging content (original content creation basis client's ROI)

Performing research on current benchmark trends and audience preferences

Monitor SEO and web traffic metrics

Collaborate with other teams, like marketing, sales and customer service to ensure brand consistency

Communicate with followers, respond to queries in a timely manner and monitor customer reviews

Oversee social media accounts’ design (e.g. Facebook timeline cover, profile pictures and blog layout)
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Manager - Social and Digital Media Services

profile_positions.description:
Updating client's social media accounts and posting content

Overseeing ad campaigns, promotions, competitions and their timely roll out

Optimising content for different platforms

Scheduling content release times for maximum engagement

Responding to engagement and reader's questions

Collaborating with designers, copywriters and videographers

Maintaining weekly, monthly, half-yearly and yearly reviews
profile_positions.title: Assistant Account Manager - Social & Digital Media Services

profile_positions.description:
Client Servicing Executive for mainline Advertising (Print and Outdoor) with key role of managing client expectations and requirements in a timely and orderly fashion

Key clients inclusive of Bentley Oman, Audi Oman and Ahlibank

Overlooking and assisting with Traditional media buying, negotiating discounts and offerings and planning 

Traditional media innovations, particularly in Radio were some other roles managed
profile_positions.title: Client Servicing Executive

profile_positions.description:
Began my career with Glitch Media Pvt. Ltd, a specialised Digital Agency in Mumbai as a Junior Graphic Designer and progressed to the position of Art Director

Worked with various giants such as Unilever, Marico and OMD during my stint here

Key brands included Vaseline, Kissan, Cornetto, L’Oreal, ITC, Lindt Arabia, Audi India, Dalda Oils, MTV Coke Studio, etc

We also planned the visual direction on digital channels for various Bollywood movies such as Once Upon A Time in Mumbai Dobara, Loottera and Barfi to name a few
profile_positions.title: Art Director
